_meta.description: Each business object models a small local business within the TrustShield ecosystem.
_meta.data_structure_notes: Ratings are stored as an array of objects to allow temporal analysis, volatility detection, entropy calculations, and ML feature extraction.
_meta.design_decision: Storing date-stamped ratings allows trend detection, recency bias modeling, and fraud spike detection.

_meta.description: Urban Threads demonstrates a volatile and low-rating profile for contrast testing.
_meta.testing_purpose: Used to validate fraud detection and volatility modeling.
